name: OptiFi
introduce: OptiFi is a derivatives DEX with a portfolio-based margining approach and partial liquidations engine, powered by Solana and Serum. Portfolio Margining allows users to net the overall portfolio risk to enhance capital efficiency, and Partial Liquidations ensure fair liquidation and pricing for all users.Moreover, OptiFi implements the Options Automated Market Maker (AMM) integrated delta-hedging capabilities, where any user can contribute USDC into the OptiFi AMM vaults to generate yield and provide continuous liquidity in OptiFi exchange.
